content.rendered:
Lisa and Lee’s Journey with Hyper

“Before joining Hyper, we had a big idea but no real understanding of how to bring it to life or who to turn to. The startup space felt overwhelming, and we were struggling to find the right direction and trusted partners. We knew we wanted to help parents and children, but we had no clear roadmap to make that happen.

Hyper helped us overcome this challenge by guiding us through their Accelerate program, which broke everything down into clear, manageable steps. They helped us flesh out our concept, validate the idea, understand the commercial landscape, and ultimately turn our vision into a working prototype we could test and build upon.

One of the most valuable things we gained from Hyper was clarity and confidence. Their team supported us across design, strategy, and forecasting, helping us understand how to take an idea and turn it into something real and viable. Thanks to Hyper’s guidance, we were able to conceptualise our idea, conduct real market validation, deeply understand the needs of our intended audience, and bring the concept to life. We also connected with an incredible app development partner who still works with us today. With Hyper’s insight, we successfully launched our product and started growing a business with real purpose and impact.”
